name: Freeway-Duck
description: Detects and censors profanities (alt-profanity-check) for advanced detection and custom word lists.
instructions: Configure your censor settings and custom word lists. This plugin uses Machine Learning (alt-profanity-check) for robust detection that goes beyond simple word lists.

settings.name: censor_char
settings.label: Censor Character
settings.help_text: The character used to mask profanities (e.g., *, #, @).

settings.name: custom_words
settings.label: Custom Profane Words
settings.help_text: Comma-separated list of additional words you want to censor.

settings.name: block_sentence
settings.label: Block Entire Sentence
settings.help_text: If enabled, blocks the entire sentence containing a profanity instead of just masking the word.
